reviewText: I liked Humphrey.  Maud was a bit irritating, though.  A little too bossy.  There are a few vulgar words, one instance of Wolf Larson taking the Lord's name in vain (beginning of second disc).  Overall though it was just like the book, except for a few minor details which didn't make much of a difference.  There's quite a bit of blood when one of the crew is getting beaten-up.  The gutting of the seals was hard to watch.
